pgrid
Class Exchange

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      pgrid.util.LexicalDefaultHandler
          pgrid.Exchange
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, LexicalHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExchangeMessage, ExchangeReplyMessage
public abstract class Exchange
extends LexicalDefaultHandler

This class represents a P-Grid Exchange.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

Creates a new exchange with given values.

Parameters:
guid - the Exchange GUID.
host - the creating host.
recursion - the recursion.
lCurrent - the current common length.
replicaEst - the replication estimate.
routingTable - the Routing Table of the creating host.
dataTable - the list of data items.
